text: The 1896–97 Yale Bulldogs men's basketball team represented Yale University in intercollegiate basketball during the 1896–97 season. The team finished the season with an 11–5 record and was retroactively named the national champion by the Premo-Porretta Power Poll. ==References== Category:Yale Bulldogs men's basketball seasons Yale Category:NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament championship seasons Yale Bulldogs Men's Basketball Team Yale Bulldogs Men's Basketball Team
title: 1896–97 Yale Bulldogs men's basketball team
